mapper.insert: INSERT INTO order_table ( id, created_at, delivery_fee, total_prod_pric, total_bene_pric, total_ord_pric, reg_date, reg_id, up_date, up_id ) VALUES ( #{id}, now(), #{delivery_fee}, #{total_prod_pric}, #{total_bene_pric}, #{total_ord_pric}, now(), #{reg_id}, now(), #{up_id} )
mapper.select: SELECT ord_seq, created_at, delivery_fee, total_prod_pric, total_bene_pric, total_ord_pric, reg_date, reg_id, up_date, up_id, id FROM order_table WHERE ord_seq = #{ord_seq};
